text:
@kanyewest Your campaign #2020Vision , if you were such a visionary, Miss Cleo wannabe , where were you when COVID19 was manifesting?
This is not a “thing”, you want to play with. You and your attention seeking wife, @KimKardashian will be tattered to shreds publicly.
